MS MCQs

    Secure Cognitive Services

    »

    1. Which property related to your Cognitive Services instance is most important to keep secret?

      Subscription Key

      Endpoint

      Resource Group

      Service Name


    2. When running code on your computer that connects to Cognitive Services, you receive an error that access is denied due to Virtual Network/Firewall rules. What configuration do you need to set in the Cognitive Services instance?

      In the Networking properties, configure Selected Networks and Private Endpoints.

      In Networking properties, add your client IP address to the Firewall allowed list.

      In Access control, add your Azure Active Directory user account to a role.


    3. What is the purpose of an assigned Azure Policy?

      Deny users access to resources.

      Automate security configuration.

      Configure network security.

      Audit compliance of resources to the policy.
